sentence.Network_en: They should be able to comport themselves as they want.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们应该能够自由地表现自我。

sentence.Network_en: His behavior did not comport with his office.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的行为与他的职务很不相称.

sentence.Network_en: The Colonel gave me advice on how to comport myself in the White House.
sentence.Network_cn: 上校建议我在白宫该如何表现.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... complex 复杂,错综的 comport 适合,相称 comprehend 了解,包括,包含.
complicate 使复杂comport 适合,相称comprehend 了解,包括,包含
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... portfolio n 文件夹；投资组合 comport v 举止，行为 comportment n 举止.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... portfolio n 文件夹；投资组合 comport v 举止，行为 comportment n 举止.

list.abs: He comports himself like a hero ., 他立身如英雄.
The child turned to its mother comport ., 那孩子向母亲求安慰.
suzhou comport hydraulic lifting machinery co. , ltd ., 苏州康博特液压升降机械有限公司.
AUTRES 别的comportements anormaux 不正常的行为agite 手舞足蹈

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'tolerate'): from Latin comportare, from com- 'together' + portare 'carry, bear'
late 19th cent.: apparently an abbreviation of French comportier, variant of compotier 'dessert dish'

entry.def: If you comport yourself in a particular way, you behave in that way.

example.ex: They should be able to comport themselves as they want.
example.tran: 他们应该能够自由地表现自我。

sentences.sentence: "They conducted themselves well during these difficult times"

auth_sentence.content: But we comport ourselves and go accordingly on the electoral procedure.
auth_sentence.res_content: But we comport ourselves and go accordingly on the electoral procedure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But we comport ourselves and go accordingly on the electoral procedure.

auth_sentence.content: The film's squalid images didn't comport with the India they frequented.
auth_sentence.res_content: The film's squalid images didn't comport with the India they frequented.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The film's squalid images didn't comport with the India they frequented.

auth_sentence.content: However work the creative force, its product, ie the supply, must comport with the selective process, or be eliminated.
auth_sentence.res_content: However work the creative force, its product, ie the supply, must comport with the selective process, or be eliminated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However work the creative force, its product, ie the supply, must comport with the selective process, or be eliminated.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportion比例;均衡+al……的→adj.比例的, 成比例的, 相称的, 均衡的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重要的, 重大的, 有权力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: import要旨,含意+ant……的→adj.重要的, 重大的, 有权力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+able能……的→adj.轻便的,手提[式]的,可移动的
dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称

stems_affixes.value_cn: 按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
stems_affixes.word_buile: proportional比例的+ly表副词→adv.按比例地, 相配合地;适当地
port部分,分开+ion表名词→一部分
pro多+port部分,分开+ion→多个部分,每部分占用一定比例
comport[v.举止,行为]+ment表名词→n.举止
deport[v.驱逐出境]+ation表名词→n.移送,充军,放逐
de加强+port拿,运+ment表名词→一个人所拿[带的]的举止
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义
import传达意义+ance表名词→带有意义的状态→重要性
port拿,运→拿或运东西的地方→港口,舱门
port拿,运+age费用→运费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
stems_affixes.word_buile: port拿,运+er人→n.守门人,门房,行李搬运工,服务员
port拿,运+folio树叶,页→拿树叶,书页的东西→文件夹
pur=per全部+port拿,运→全部拿到一起→要领,意义
s=dis+port传递→原为一种游戏
sport运动+s+man人→n.运动家, 冒险家

stems_affixes.value_cn: 运输;运输系统,运载工具
stems_affixes.word_buile: trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输
transport运输,运送+ation表名词→n.运输,运送,客运
dis分开+port拿,运→拿来分心的东西→娱乐
ex出+port港口→出港口→出口
im进入+port港口→进港→进口,传达意义

stems_affixes.value_cn: 报告, 传说,报到, 告发
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+port带→把[消息,情况]带回
ap成为+port部分,分开+ion表名词→把整体分成部分→分配

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使不均衡, 使不对称
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis不+proportion[n.比例;部分;均衡,相称]+al……的→adj.&n.不均衡, 不成比例 v.使不均衡, 使不对称
com共同+port拿,引申为动作→一个人的全部动作
de去掉+port拿,运→拿出去→放逐
sup下面+port带→带来支持
trans转移+port搬运→搬运转移→运输

sentences.en: The Colonel gave me advice on how to comport myself in the White House.
sentences.cn: 上校建议我在白宫该如何表现。
